languages.text: "Лучше встретить вызов перемен и погибнуть, не справившись с ним, чем сгнить заживо".
"It is better to meet the challenge of change and perish in failure than to rot alive."
languages.original_text: "Лучше встретить вызов перемен и погибнуть, не справившись с ним, чем сгнить заживо".

traits.locale_text: "It is better to meet the challenge of change and perish in failure than to rot alive."
"Better to die fighting against change than to rot alive."
"It is better to meet the challenge of change and perish in failure than to rot alive."
"Better to die fighting against change than to rot alive."
"Better to die fighting against change than to rot alive."
"It is better to meet the challenge of change and perish in failure than to rot alive."
"It is better to meet the challenge of change and perish in failure than to rot alive."

languages.text: 「生きて腐りゆくよりも、変化に抵抗して滅びる方がマシだ」
languages.original_text: "It is better to meet the challenge of change and perish in failure than to rot alive."

traits.locale_text: 「生きて腐りゆくよりも、変化に抵抗して滅びる方がマシだ」

languages.text: “宁可在变革的挑战中牺牲，也不能坐以待毙。”
languages.original_text: "It is better to meet the challenge of change and perish in failure than to rot alive."

traits.locale_text: “宁可在变革的斗争中牺牲，也不能坐以待毙。”

languages.text: "Es ist besser sich der Herausforderung des Wandels zu stellen und dabei zu sterben, als lebendig zu verrotten."
languages.original_text: "It is better to meet the challenge of change and perish in failure than to rot alive."

traits.locale_text: "Lieber im Kampf gegen Veränderung sterben als lebendig verrotten."

languages.text: « Mieux vaut se dresser contre les aléas du changement plutôt que de pourrir sur pied. »
languages.original_text: "It is better to meet the challenge of change and perish in failure than to rot alive."

traits.locale_text: « Mieux vaut se dresser contre les aléas du changement plutôt que de pourrir sur pied. »

languages.text: «Es mejor enfrentarse al cambio y morir que vivir en podredumbre».
languages.original_text: "It is better to meet the challenge of change and perish in failure than to rot alive."

traits.locale_text: «Morir luchando contra el cambio es mejor que pudrirse en vida».

languages.text: "Değişim mücadelesinin içinde yer almak ve başarısız olup yok olmak, canlı canlı çürümekten daha iyidir."
languages.original_text: "It is better to meet the challenge of change and perish in failure than to rot alive."

traits.locale_text: "Değişim mücadelesinin içinde yer almak ve başarısız olup yok olmak, canlı canlı çürümekten daha iyidir."
